verses.verse: And it came to pass on the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117>, that Moses<WH4872> called<WH7121> Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121>, and the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478>;

And he said<WH559> unto Aaron<WH175>, Take<WH3947> thee a young<WH1241><WH1121> calf<WH5695> for a sin offering<WH2403>, and a ram<WH352> for a burnt offering<WH5930>, without blemish<WH8549>, and offer<WH7126> them before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068>.

And unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> thou shalt speak<WH1696>, saying<WH559>, Take<WH3947> ye a kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin offering<WH2403>; and a calf<WH5695> and a lamb<WH3532>, both of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141>, without blemish<WH8549>, for a burnt offering<WH5930>;

Also a bullock<WH7794> and a ram<WH352> for peace offerings<WH8002>, to sacrifice<WH2076> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068>; and a meat offering<WH4503> mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>: for to day<WH3117> the LORD<WH3068> will appear<WH7200> unto you.

¶ And they brought<WH3947> that which Moses<WH4872> commanded<WH6680> before<WH6440> the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150>: and all the congregation<WH5712> drew near<WH7126> and stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068>.
And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559>, This is the thing<WH1697> which the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> that ye should do<WH6213>: and the glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> shall appear<WH7200> unto you.

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto Aaron<WH175>, Go<WH7126> unto the altar<WH4196>, and offer<WH6213> thy sin offering<WH2403>, and thy burnt offering<WH5930>, and make an atonement<WH3722> for thyself, and for the people<WH5971>: and offer<WH6213> the offering<WH7133> of the people<WH5971>, and make an atonement<WH3722> for them; as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680>.
¶ Aaron<WH175> therefore went<WH7126> unto the altar<WH4196>, and slew<WH7819> the calf<WH5695> of the sin offering<WH2403>, which was for himself.

And the sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> brought<WH7126> the blood<WH1818> unto him: and he dipped<WH2881> his finger<WH676> in the blood<WH1818>, and put<WH5414> it upon the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196>, and poured<WH3332> out the blood<WH1818> at the bottom<WH3247> of the altar<WH4196>:

But the fat<WH2459>, and the kidneys<WH3629>, and the caul<WH3508> above<WH4480> the liver<WH3516> of the sin offering<WH2403>, he burnt<WH6999> upon the altar<WH4196>; as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.
And the flesh<WH1320> and the hide<WH5785> he burnt<WH8313> with fire<WH784> without<WH2351> the camp<WH4264>.
And he slew<WH7819> the burnt offering<WH5930>; and Aaron's<WH175> sons<WH1121> presented<WH4672> unto him the blood<WH1818>, which he sprinkled<WH2236> round about<WH5439> upon the altar<WH4196>.
And they presented<WH4672> the burnt offering<WH5930> unto him, with the pieces<WH5409> thereof, and the head<WH7218>: and he burnt<WH6999> them upon the altar<WH4196>.
And he did wash<WH7364> the inwards<WH7130> and the legs<WH3767>, and burnt<WH6999> them upon the burnt offering<WH5930> on the altar<WH4196>.

¶ And he brought<WH7126> the people's<WH5971> offering<WH7133>, and took<WH3947> the goat<WH8163>, which was the sin offering<WH2403> for the people<WH5971>, and slew<WH7819> it, and offered it for sin<WH2398>, as the first<WH7223>.
And he brought<WH7126> the burnt offering<WH5930>, and offered<WH6213> it according to the manner<WH4941>.

And he brought<WH7126> the meat offering<WH4503>, and took<WH4390> an handful<WH3709> thereof, and burnt<WH6999> it upon the altar<WH4196>, beside<WH905> the burnt sacrifice<WH5930> of the morning<WH1242>.

He slew<WH7819> also the bullock<WH7794> and the ram<WH352> for a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings<WH8002>, which was for the people<WH5971>: and Aaron's<WH175> sons<WH1121> presented<WH4672> unto him the blood<WH1818>, which he sprinkled<WH2236> upon the altar<WH4196> round about<WH5439>,
And the fat<WH2459> of the bullock<WH7794> and of the ram<WH352>, the rump<WH451>, and that which covereth<WH4374> the inwards, and the kidneys<WH3629>, and the caul<WH3508> above the liver<WH3516>:
And they put<WH7760> the fat<WH2459> upon the breasts<WH2373>, and he burnt<WH6999> the fat<WH2459> upon the altar<WH4196>:
And the breasts<WH2373> and the right<WH3225> shoulder<WH7785> Aaron<WH175> waved<WH5130> for a wave offering<WH8573> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068>; as Moses<WH4872> commanded<WH6680>.

And Aaron<WH175> lifted up<WH5375> his hand<WH3027> toward the people<WH5971>, and blessed<WH1288> them, and came down<WH3381> from offering<WH6213> of the sin offering<WH2403>, and the burnt offering<WH5930>, and peace offerings<WH8002>.

And Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> went<WH935> into the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150>, and came out<WH3318>, and blessed<WH1288> the people<WH5971>: and the glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> unto all the people<WH5971>.

And there came<WH3318> a fire<WH784> out from before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068>, and consumed<WH398> upon the altar<WH4196> the burnt offering<WH5930> and the fat<WH2459>: which when all the people<WH5971> saw<WH7200>, they shouted<WH7442>, and fell<WH5307> on their faces<WH6440>.
